Melania Trump: s biography on the White House website initially mentioned her QVC jewelry line, specifically her own jewelry collection called "Melania™ Timepieces & Jewelry."
QVC: the shopping network that Melania Trump's jewelry line was promoted on, confirmed that they no longer have an active relationship with her brand.
The statement regarding Melania Trump: s jewelry lines was removed from her biography page on the White House website as of January 23, 2017.
A government watchdog group: Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics, filed a complaint accusing President Donald Trump of violating the emoluments clause of the Constitution by not severing ties with his business holdings, including Melania Trump's jewelry line, before taking office.
